description: Camp One Ventures, founded in 2012, focuses on providing critical capital to early-stage innovators, leveraging the general partners' deep domain expertise in technology sectors such as financial technology, blockchain, consumer internet, and SaaS. With roots in Silicon Valley since the 1990s, the firm grooms growing disrupters for their first institutional funding round, attracting tier-1 investment opportunities through its partners' technical expertise, deep-rooted Silicon Valley relationships, and investment experience. Camp One Ventures primarily invests in financial technology, mobile marketplaces, and software-as-a-service (SaaS) segments, where it holds a competitive advantage.
